name: Slam Dunk
description:
Slam Dunk is a fast paced one-on-one local multiplayer basketball game, the first player to reach 21 points wins! On offense your goal is to either hit a shot over the defender or fake them out and slide through for the easy dunk. Having a shot blocked or sliding through a defender who didn't bite on a fake will result in turning the ball over. Get on a streak and you might just reach the stars!

Controls

The default controls are setup for Xbox360 controllers

Left Thumbstick - Move left and right

Offsense

Y/X - Hold and release to shoot, the longer you hold the further the shot (Tap when inside the defender for a dunk)

A/B - Hold and release for a fake shot slide

Defense

X/Y/B/A - Block

Other

R - Restart Game

Esc - Exit Game

The game is setup to be played with two Xbox360 controllers however the inputs can be remapped to support keyboards or other controllers under the Input tab of the launch dialogue box. When remapping inputs any control name that ends in '0' is for player 1 and any control name that ends in '1' is for player 2.
